files.summary: Thin WCF client wrapper for the Nursys eNotify web service. Calls ManageNurseListAsync to subscribe or update nurse license monitoring subscriptions, enforcing TLS 1.2 for the connection.
files.businessPurpose: Enables the platform to subscribe to Nursys license status notifications for nursing program participants, supporting automated license verification workflows for nursing education programs.
keyMethods: GetNurses(ManageNurseListRequest) - Calls the Nursys eNotify ManageNurseListAsync WCF operation, iterates nurse responses, and logs per-license success or failure to Console
files.migrationNote: WCF client code cannot be directly ported to Node.js. The Nursys eNotify service uses SOAP/WCF; the Node.js migration would require a SOAP client (e.g., node-soap) or a direct REST API equivalent if Nursys provides one. Console.WriteLine-based response handling indicates this is early-stage integration code that needs proper error handling in migration.

directoryOverview: NurseNotifyService business module providing nursenotifyservice functionality for the MyEvaluations platform.
